Description: The ADIMA system shall not fail from single point failures or due to common mode errors.
The ADIMA system shall ensure that more than 50% of LEDs allocated to the emergency lighting are operational.
Rationale: Ensures sufficient emergency lighting, requires multiple hardware modules.

Description: The ADIMA system shall ensure that only LEDs perform related tasks.
Rationale: To counteract potential fire hazards due to incorrect commands.

Description: The system shall prioritize the functionality of emergency lighting.
Rationale: This may be achieved by using LEDs for emergency lighting instead of cabin lighting.
